snippet: Works by the photographer Garry Winogrand — more than any museum has mounted at once — are the focus of a retrospective at the San Francisco Museum of Modern Art.
abstract: Photographs of Garry Winogrand are staged in largest retrospective of his work that any museum has mounted at San Francisco Museum of Modern Art; photographer refreshed classic street photography in 1960s and 1970s, influenced by increasingly warped sensibility that had started to shape broader culture; Winogrand's snapshot style was influential in its own right.
lead_paragraph: Works by the photographer Garry Winogrand — more than any museum has mounted at once — are the focus of a retrospective at the San Francisco Museum of Modern Art.

headline.seo: Garry Winogrand Retrospective in San Francisco

keywords.value: San Francisco Museum of Modern Art
